ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been to Highpass Hold, you need to be level 15 + to stay alive alone. ... From: Alex Dalis  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I have been to Highpass Hold, you need to be level 15 + to stay alive alone.
----- Original Message -----
From: Alex Dalis <dalisa@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 5:57 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Smithing


> From: Alex Dalis <dalisa@...>
>
> I'm afriad that the closest place is HighHold Pass. There you can find a
number
> of smithing supplies. However the journey is lonnnngggg and dangerous to
under
> 9th level characters. Camo and Invis a great help. Take Qeynos Hills to
west
> karana to north karana to east karana and then to HighHold Pass and
explore the
> city. You could also go into the beholder maze if you and a 17+ character
and
> fight some mudites, they drop ore and clay.
>
> MCollins wrote:
>
> > From: MCollins <sandman1@...>
> >
> > I am a beginning smith based in Qeynos and i am having a great deal of
> > trouble finding ore near that city. I was told that the closest place
> > to find ore was in the Dwarven area, but I find it hard to believe that
> > I would have to go that far! Does anyone know of a place I can get ore
> > within 2or 3 zones of Qeynos?
> >
> > Marc
> >

Week!
